SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package datamodel

Class Pricing

Object
Pricing
public class Pricing extends Object
Immutable class to store pricing information organized by Enum Pricing.PricingCategory with: 
 - BasePricing(Country.Germany),
 - BlackFridayPricing(Country.Germany) (discounts),
 - SwissPricing(Country.Switzerland),
 - UKPricing(Country.UnitedKingdom).
Pricing includes a Pricing.TAXRate applicable to each Article and a Pricing.Currency that is associated with a Pricing.Country and in which an Article is priced. Value-added Pricing.TAXRate (VAT) categories used in different countries are: 
 - https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Umsatzsteuer_(Deutschland)
 - https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mehrwertsteuer_(Schweiz)
 - https://www.gov.uk/vat-rates
Version:
"D12-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
Author:
"sgraupner"

  • Method Details

    • put

      public Pricing put(Article article, long unitPrice, Pricing.TAXRate taxRate)
      Store or update Article with new Pricing.PriceRecord in article price map.
      Parameters:
      article - article to store or update in article price map
      unitPrice - price associated with one unit of the Article
      taxRate - tax rate applicable to Article
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference

    • unitPrice

      public long unitPrice(Article article)
      Return unit price for Article.
      Parameters:
      article - subject of unit price request
      Returns:
      article unit price or 0 if article is not in price map

    • taxRate

      public Pricing.TAXRate taxRate(Article article)
      Return Pricing.TAXRate for Article.
      Parameters:
      article - subject of tax rate request
      Returns:
      tax rate that applies to article

    • taxRateAsPercent

      public double taxRateAsPercent(Article article)
      Return Pricing.TAXRate as percent value for Article, e.g. value 19.0 for tax rate of 19%.
      Parameters:
      article - subject of tax rate request
      Returns:
      tax rate as percent value that applies to article
